title: Font like this?
content:
anybody know of a font like this one?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vikesticket.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110818110840/http:/typophile.com/files/vikesticket.jpg) | 22.83 KB |
author: popinfresh

comments.content: One of two things either its a pixel font or the smoothing was turned off. I think Indie Fonts 2 has a lot of pixel fonts to research.

[Checkout Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20110818110840/http:/static.flickr.com/29/43079259_14635c39f9_o.png) is one of the new Club-21 that will be available at FontShop.com next week. It's available over email right now if you call.

[FF Dot Matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20110818110840/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=10&displayfontid=FF.8502.0.0&fontRendererText=MINNESOTA+VIKINGS) also has a paper receipt look.

Looking to get into some football games, eh popinfresh? ;)

- Lex

Yeah, I'm making an invitation for an event, and they want to go with a football ticket theme.

Thanks for the help everyone.

-Dave
